title: 34.21ct Boulder Opal & Diamond Pendant
description: Opal and Diamond pendant with freeform cabochon cut Natural Boulder Opal totalling 34.21ct and round Natural Diamonds totalling 0.50ct. (Estimated grading: G-H SI-P1). 18ct white gold and 40.5cm 18ct white gold chain. Chain made in Italy. Weight: 19.4g. With Certificate #421827. (Pre-owned)
